thing-type.label: PAT02-B Z-Wave room sensor
thing-type.description:
Z-Wave room sensor

Overview

The flood multisensor PAT02 has flood, temperature and humidity, 3 sensors function in one, based on Z-WaveTM technology


Inclusion Information

Pressing the tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the inclusion mode.


Exclusion Information

Pressing tamper key three times within 1.5 seconds to enter the exclusion mode


Wakeup Information

Press the tamper key once. The device will wake-up 10 seconds.

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: Operation Mode
parameter.description:
set Operation Mode using bit to control

Overview

set Operation Mode using bit to control

  • Bit 0: Reserve
  • Bit 1: Reserve
  • Bit 2: Reserve
  • Bit 3: Setting temperature scale
    • 0: Fahrenheit
    • 1: Celsius
  • Bit 4: Reserve
  • Bit 5: Reserve
  • Bit 6: Reserve
  • Bit 7: Reserve

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: Customer Function
parameter.description:
Customer Function switch using bit control

Overview

Customer Function switch using bit control

  • Bit 0: Reserve
  • Bit 1: Reserve
  • Bit 2: Reserve
  • Bit 3:Â not applicable for this device variant, set to 0
  • Bit 4: Notification Type
    • 0: Using Notification Report
    • 1: Using Sensor Binary Report
  • Bit 5: Disable Multi CC in auto report
    • 0: Enable
    • 1: Disable
  • Bit 6: not applicable for this device variant, set to 0
  • Bit 7: Reserve

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Auto Report Battery Time
parameter.description:
The interval time for auto reporting the battery level.

Overview

The interval time for auto reporting the battery level.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report battery.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Auto Report Temperature Time
parameter.description:
The interval time for auto reporting the temperature state.

Overview

The interval time for auto reporting the temperature state.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report temperature.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Auto Report Humidity Time
parameter.description:
The interval time for auto reporting the humidity state.

Overview

The interval time for auto reporting the humidity state.

  • 0 = Turn off auto report.
  • 1-127 = Number of ticks. The default value is 12. The tick time can be set by configuration No. 20.

parameter.name: config_20_1
parameter.label: 20: Auto Report Tick Interval
parameter.description:
The interval time for auto report each tick.

Overview

The interval time for auto report each tick. Units of one minute. Setting configuration will affect configuration no. 10, 13, 14 and 15.

  • Caution1: Setting to 0 means turn off all auto report function.
  • Caution2: The value is unsigned byte.

parameter.name: config_21_1
parameter.label: 21: Temperature Differential Report
parameter.description:
The temperature differential to report.

Overview

The temperature differential to report.

  • The unit is Fahrenheit.
  • Enable this function the device will detect every 10 seconds.
